d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - General - All available product codes
d2_dictionary.title: Provides a list of product codes for registered products that the user can access.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select product_code as name from cd_product_info where a_status='Active' order by 1
